auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to continue to your church community
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.registerSubtitle: Create your account to join your church community
auth.joinAsMemberSubtitle: Find and join a church later
auth.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.churchNameMinLength: Church name must be at least 2 characters
auth.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth.findChurchLaterSubtitle: You can browse and find churches to join after creating your account. Your account will be ready to connect with a church community.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
settings.rolesPermissionsSubtitle: Manage church roles and assign permissions

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and preferences
profile.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed. Contact support if needed.
profile.updateSuccessDescription: Your profile information has been updated successfully

churchInfo.title: Church Information
churchInfo.subtitle: Manage your church settings and details
churchInfo.mediaLibrarySubtitle: Logo, cover images, and media assets

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.subtitle: Update your church details
generalInfo.denominationHelper: Optional - helps others find your church
generalInfo.locationPlaceholder: e.g., City, State or Full Address
generalInfo.locationHelper: Optional - helps members find your church
generalInfo.timezoneHelper: Used for scheduling and time-based features
generalInfo.churchUpdatedMessage: Church information has been updated successfully

profileGeneral.title: General Information
profileGeneral.subtitle: Update your personal details
profileGeneral.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed. Contact support if needed.
profileGeneral.profileUpdatedMessage: Your profile information has been updated successfully

members.title: Members
members.subtitle: Manage your church members and membership requests
members.noMembersMessage: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
members.noMembersEmptyMessage: Members will appear here once they join your church
members.noRequestsMessage: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
members.noRequestsEmptyMessage: Pending membership requests will appear here
members.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member from your church? This action cannot be undone.
members.removeMembersConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove %{count} member from your church? This action cannot be undone.
members.removeMembersConfirmPlural: Are you sure you want to remove %{count} members from your church? This action cannot be undone.

home.churchCommunity: You're now part of a church community
home.featuresDescription: Dashboard features, member management, and team coordination tools are being developed.

teams.title: Teams
teams.subtitle: Manage worship, prayer, and ministry teams
teams.comingSoonDescription: Team management features will be available soon

findChurch.title: Find a Church
findChurch.subtitle: Browse and apply to join a church community
findChurch.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, denomination, or location...
findChurch.applicationsPendingDescription: You have %{count} pending application%{plural}. Church admins will review them soon.
findChurch.allChurchesAppliedDescription: You've applied to all available churches. Check your applications page for updates.
findChurch.checkBackLater: Check back later for available churches
findChurch.pendingApplicationRequiredDescription: You have a pending application. Please cancel it first or wait for a response before applying to other churches.
findChurch.whyJoin: Why do you want to join this church?
findChurch.whyJoinSubtitle: Share a brief message with the church admins about why you'd like to join their community.
findChurch.messagePlaceholder: Tell us why you want to join this church...

applications.title: Applications
applications.subtitle: Track your church membership applications
applications.pendingStatus: Your application is being reviewed by church admins.
applications.acceptedStatus: Congratulations! Your application has been accepted.
applications.declinedStatus: Your application was declined. You can apply again if you wish.
applications.acceptedStatusSubtitle: Restart the app to access your church dashboard.
applications.startByFinding: Start by finding and applying to churches
